Did you notice the first card? That guy seems to be either 622 or 1622. May be he could not come in the morning batch and came in second batch today. Ideally he could have get a better seat if came in first batch. I am feeling little sad about him.

**Life Lesson: Never do self rejection.**   
  
Things like  
- I assumed I won't get it so I didn't attend  
- When applying for a job reading the JD, assuming that I won't get this job so I did not apply

**By trying the only possibility is to get better outcome than what you assumed while self-rejecting.**
